title: looking for smurfs (diamond 4 smurf myself)
body: hey there looking for any smurfs that wanna play. please be either gold silver of bronze on your smurf but atleast plat on your main. add me on my main staller or on my smurf flocka to talk. (will most likely be on flocka)

replies.body: Currently Silver on main but climbing, add me if you need another.
cool man give me an add {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Moving to OCE soon i would like to play with some decent players to start off ranked was mid plat last season but dropped to g1 75pts from decay ill add you when i move :)
